concept.title: Configuring LDAP Authentication
concept.shortdesc: If your organization uses LDAP, configure to use LDAP authentication. After you configure LDAP authentication, users log in to using their LDAP username and password.

conbody.p:
LDAP authenticationconfiguringTo configure LDAP authentication, perform the following tasks:
Configure LDAP connection information.
Optionally, configure secure connections to the LDAP server.
Map LDAP groups to roles.
Optionally, configure multiple LDAP servers.
If you use MapR stages, enable LDAP authentication for MapR.
